headline: TransDigm Group Incorporated (TDG)’s Wholly Owned Subsidiary, TransDigm Inc., Amends Its Existing Credit Agreement to Reprice and Extend Certain Term Loans
summary: TransDigm Group Incorporated (NYSE:TDG) is one of the 11 Best Retirement Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 18, 2025, TransDigm Group Incorporated (NYSE:TDG)’s wholly owned subsidiary, TransDigm Inc., amended its existing credit agreement to reprice and extend certain term loans. According to a filing with the SEC, TransDigm Group Incorporated (NYSE:TDG)’s subsidiary reduced […]
